snippet: The California Assembly on Thursday approved a plan that would create the highest statewide minimum wage in the nation, $15 an hour, by 2022.
lead_paragraph: The California Assembly on Thursday approved a plan that would create the highest statewide minimum wage in the nation, $15 an hour, by 2022.

headline.main: California: Minimum Wage Increase to $15 Clears First Legislative Hurdle
headline.print_headline: California: Minimum Wage Increase To $15 Clears First Legislative Hurdle
